title: I Cant open my new league new client
body: When I open my league client says league has encountered a problem please reinstall league alpha client please help

replies.body: It sounds like the installation didn't run properly and may have corrupted game files.  In this case, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)may be necessary to restore your client.  After the installation, you can proceed to add the updated client.  Let me know if you have any questions!
